title: Visakha Law College, Visakhapatnam - Admissions, Contact, Website, Facilities 2025-2026
meta_description: Visakha Law College, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, L.L.B, BA + L.L.B, L.L.M . 4 Courses. Average Fees is 23500 per year.

Section.name: About VLS
Section.description: Visakha Law College was established in the year 2009. The college is affiliated to Andhra University and is recognized by Govt. of Andhra Pradesh. It got its approval from Bar Council of India. Since Inception, College has been a focal point for all kinds of talent in the legal arena. The college has networked with govt., judiciary, society, community, industry and the professions. College offers LLB program (both 3 and 5 years) and also LLM (2 years) program. College offers state of art facilities, good infrastructure and excellent academic structure to the students studying in college. Students passed form this college are placed in top level companies.
